name: outwit
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to get an advantage over someone by acting more cleverly and often by using a trick: In the story, the cunning fox outwits the hunters.

Add to word list
Add to word list
to obtain an advantage over someone by being more intelligent; to outsmart: It is impossible to negotiate if one side feels that the other side is trying to outwit them.
